value: Brother, I...

A ruler serves their people. I was
selfish, but...I have learned much.

Princess Sharena confuses me.
She wants to be my friend even still.

Embla has been swept up in the
whims of its nobility. It is time for
a change.

The Veronica of this world is...much
like me. We both have many faults.

I am Veronica. I've come to
deliver a greeting from your
friend $Nf.

Will gaining strength help
me reach my goals?
This is...the power of Embla?
Forgive me... It's...my head...
Thank you...for considering me.

I am Veronica. The power I wield is
now at your command. Not for any
reason but that I choose to grant it.

I was foolish. I was hurt and turned
away from everyone, like a child.$k$pThe Heroes I've met have taught
me a great deal.$k$pWhat is right and what is wrong
have become clearer to me...as has
the meaning of family.$k$pWhat more will I learn while I am
here with you? How will I grow?
When will I feel...ready?$k$pSomeday, I hope.
Give in.
Enough of you.
This is already over.
Still you persist?
One day, I hoped...
I am Veronica. This form is Embla's doing.
Oh... Is this the behavior I should expect?
Embla was...lonely. I believe that is what changed her.
One day, maybe I'll be more like Alfonse and Sharena… I hope so.
A ruler's purpose is to serve their people.
I was once so closed off, alone, that...being this open with others is a challenge.
Am I...to be counted among your friends, then?
Good.
Think it through.
Going now.
